scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend pnpm db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run backend pnpx knex migrate:down
scripts.docker:db:reset: docker compose rm --force --stop postgres && docker compose up -d && docker compose run backend pnpm knex migrate:latest && pnpm docker:seed:dev
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run backend pnpm ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
